question: Who is the newly appointed Prime Minister of Republic of the Sudan?
explanation: On 1 March 2017, Bakri Hassan Saleh has been appointed by President Omar al-Bashir as Sudan\'s first Prime Minister since the post was abolished in 1989. The post of Prime Minister was re-established with limited powers, while most power remained in the hands of the President. As Prime Minister, Saleh retained his post as First Vice President of SUdan.
